item.title: Visual Studio Code Remote-SSH with ProxyJump
item.description: Visual Studio Code (vs-code) Remote-SSH extension is a powerful tool for remote development. Combined with extensions like jupyter and python interactive development, it is extremely useful for exploratory data analysis for on-cloud data. For security reason, sometimes the remote machine is in your company’s intranet or behind a firewall. To use Remote-SSH extension, we need a intermediate server or jump box by ProxyJump config option, which was introduced in ssh version 7.
